title: well this is new
body: okay i tried playing a game right i tried to load in and stuff went to get a drink came back and this is this a know error or not caused me to get lbs plz fix this riot

replies.body:
Translation: So I tried playing a game last night, and while it was loading I went to get a drink. Once I came back I got this error. Is this a known error or not. Please fix riot (don't know what lbs means)

I found this website that could help you, but just keep in mind everything isn't riot's fault.
http://helpdeskgeek.com/help-desk/instruction-at-referenced-memory-could-not-be-read/
